sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/SellSteps.css"; /** * SellSteps - improved responsive zig-zag layout * * Uses the workspace image paths (already uploaded): * - main illustrations: /mnt/data/ce360b36-2a12-4891-bbca-e0aef2efc47e.png * - other illustration: /mnt/data/d2000117-1289-4f4d-9ebb-3e7e6edb26f6.png * - small icons: /mnt/data/separate_icon_1.png, _2.png, _3.png * * Drop-in: import and use where needed. */ export default function SellSteps() { const steps = [ { id: 1, title: "Let's talk about your car", text: "Tell us about your beloved and get an instant online quote", cta: "Get quote", // illustration shown on the visual side image: "/mnt/data/ce360b36-2a12-4891-bbca-e0aef2efc47e.png", icon: "/mnt/data/separate_icon_1.png", }, { id: 2, title: "Pick a day", text: "At home or your nearest CarsDedo Car Hub, for a free car valuation and a final offer.", cta: "Get quote", image: "/mnt/data/d2000117-1289-4f4d-9ebb-3e7e6edb26f6.png", icon: "/mnt/data/separate_icon_2.png", }, { id: 3, title: "Credited, the same day", text: "Complete payment and paperwork on-the-spot", cta: "Sell car", image: "/mnt/data/ce360b36-2a12-4891-bbca-e0aef2efc47e.png", icon: "/mnt/data/separate_icon_3.png", }, ]; return (

Sell your car for the Best Price

{steps.map((s, idx) => (

{s.title}

{s.text}

))}

Sit back, relax. Car in Transit

Our seller protection policy ensures that you're protected from any liabilities until your RC transfer is completed

e.preventDefault()}> Learn More ›
); }
